topic.title: How to Add Text to the Cover Page

body.p: If you need to add arbitrary text to the cover page, you can use the oxy:front-page-title element as an anchor and add as many blocks of text as you need after it, and style them differently.

To use content from the document you can use in the content property the oxy_xpath function. See the link below for a more complex example, including the generation of a new page for the synthetic :after elements.
